attributes.text: Mixin for supporting the background images on decorators.
new value of the property
previous value of the property (null if it was not yet set).

Applies changes of the property value of the property backgroundRepeat.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #backgroundRepeat}.
CSS styles as map
Responsible for generating the markup for the background. This method just uses the settings in the properties to generate the markup.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property backgroundImage with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #backgroundImage}.

Resets the user value of the property backgroundImage.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #backgroundImage}.

The URL of the background image
Property group to define the background position

Either a string or a number, which defines the horizontal position of the background image.

If the value is an integer it is interpreted as a pixel value, otherwise the value is taken to be a CSS value. For CSS, the values are “center”, “left” and “right”.

Either a string or a number, which defines the vertical position of the background image.

If the value is an integer it is interpreted as a pixel value, otherwise the value is taken to be a CSS value. For CSS, the values are “top”, “middle” and “bottom”.
How the background image should be repeated
